overview: Francesca Le is the new girl at a boarding house run by Kym Wilde. Said boarding house is a hive alive with all-girl kink, as Francesca discovers on her first day. The girls take turns holding getting-to-know you sessions with Ms. Le, and when all of the introductions, both formal and personal have been made, the entire cast adjourns to the garden for a ravenous all-girl orgy. Elsewhere, Christy Canyon turns in some of the best work of her long and distinguished career, and Racquel Darrian is typically hell-for-leather horny when confronted with so many luscious young bodies and libidos.
title: Where The Boys Aren't 5
